  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int numOfPlayers)
      the constructor of this class, that uses the boolean masks to fill the "true" marked spots
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - number of players at the start of the game,used for switch cases

  • Method Details

    • refillBoard

      public void refillBoard() throws SoldOutTilesException
      method for refilling the board if necessary,leaving the already filled TileSlots untouched
      Throws:
      SoldOutTilesException

    • removeCardFromBoard

      public Tile[] removeCardFromBoard(ArrayList<Coordinates> positions) throws EmptySlotException, InvalidSlotException, InvalidPositionsException
      Method for removing from the board the player's selected tiles,first controlling if they are valid
      Parameters:
      positions - an array of Coordinates,an Integer Pair with the coordinates of the selected tiles
      Returns:
      Selected tile is an array of Tiles, later used by the Player to fill his Shelf
      Throws:
      EmptySlotException - exception for managing the selection of a free space on the board
      InvalidSlotException - exception for managing the selection of a Tile with no free spaces around
      InvalidPositionsException

    • refillIsNecessary

      public boolean refillIsNecessary()
      method to see if on the board are only tiles with free spaces near them
